description: Allows for basic control of a mesh router

disconnectedRouterCount.label: disconnected router count
disconnectedRouterCount.description: A numeric representation of the quantity of disconnected routers in the mesh network

connectedRouterCount.label: connected router count
connectedRouterCount.description: A numeric representation of the quantity of connected routers in the mesh network

wifiGuestNetworkStatus.label: wifi guest network status
wifiGuestNetworkStatus.description: The current state of the guest network.  Possible values are "enabled", "disabled", and "not configured"

wifiGuestNetworkName.label: wifi guest network name
wifiGuestNetworkName.description: A string representation of the guest WiFi network name

wifiNetworkStatus.label: wifi network status
wifiNetworkStatus.description: The current state of the primary network.  Possible values are "enabled", "disabled", and "not configured"

wifiNetworkName.label: wifi network name
wifiNetworkName.description: A string representation of the primary WiFi network name

connectedDeviceCount.label: connected device count
connectedDeviceCount.description: A numeric representation of the quantity of connected WiFi devices in the network
